price: 68.Idoolitti iyyam fan qumri как neyxeere num ginó kaak korisnaah, yooboke saakih innah kaa gacisna hebeebih (sabarah), amah abe Rabbi qhiyaamah ayró ken ugusu waamih dudda leemil ma kas- kassoowaanaa?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
